title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Apr 16 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Apr 16 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:


Barry Diller: shutdown of economy is cataclysmic. We have to open economy, no matter how many people die. This hasn't been sustainable for a month. We will have to adapt. People die every day in America and we accept it. Senator Kennedy echoes Rush. Pelosi does comedy show from her kitchen in front of expensive refrigerators, freezer full of ice cream. Congress has fled, Trump owns Washington. NJ Governor Murphy says he never considered the Bill of Rights when he banned religious gatherings. Protests all over the country against governors. Get ready: Dems to say GOP values money over lives. Bret Baier blockbuster report: Virus originated in Wuhan lab, got out and China covered it up. Coronavirus taboos you can't talk about: flu deaths, herd immunity, hydroxychloroquine. Rush 24/7 sets new subscriber record.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:


Cuomo closes NY until May 15th. MIT study: Mass transit in NYC led to spread of disease. Cuomo, Fauci demanded 30K ventilators, didn't need them, just as Trump said. ChiComs weaponized the virus. Propaganda video of Xi Jinping walking through Wuhan wearing mask. Why are leftists never held to account when they're wrong, why are they never accused of conspiracy theories? How do we make China pay for what they've done? In a month, we've erased all the economic gains, gone back to Obama-era economy. We've destroyed lives under the guise of saving them. People are happy about this, and advocating for it to continue. According to Politico, Wall Street fat cat Democrats tell Trump to keep the country closed until people are no longer afraid of getting virus.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


New Jersey Governor Murphy didn't consider the Bill of Rights when he shut down New Jersey. People will continue to die from COVID-19, flu, all other diseases whether we reopen or not. We have to reopen, and Trump knows it. PA Democrats say GOP cares more about the stock market than saving lives. Trump honors truckers, calls them foot soldiers in fight against coronavirus. We're heading for a self-inflicted Great Depression. Montana caller frustrated by Democrat governor shutdown, despite lack of cases. America can't unify over opening the economy?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
